Feral_Blow_Prowler.display_help: You lash out at a nearby foe dealing Light damage. In primal (human) form you will deal smashing damage and will heal yourself and up to 3 nearby allies for a tiny amount of health. In Hunter form you'll deal lethal damage and reduce the target's defense. In Prowler form you'll deal lethal damage, cause minor lethal damage over time and have a small chance to stun. This power builds 1 Primal Energy. Damage: Light, Recharge: Very Fast
Feral_Blow_Prowler.display_target_help: You've been stunned by the Prowler's Feral Blow and are suffering damage over time!

Vicious_Strike_Prowler.display_help: You strike a foe dealing Moderate damage. In primal (human) form you will deal smashing damage and will heal yourself and up to 3 nearby allies for a small amount of health. In Hunter form you'll deal lethal damage and reduce the target's damage resistance. In Prowler form you'll deal lethal damage, cause minor lethal damage over time and have a fair chance to stun. This power builds 1 primal energy. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast
Vicious_Strike_Prowler.display_target_help: You've been stunned by the Prowler's Vicious Strike and are suffering damage over time!

Brutal_Swipe_Prowler.display_help: You lash out at nearby foes in a single broad strike hitting up to 5 enemies in a cone in front of you. In primal (human) form you will deal smashing damage and will heal yourself and up to 3 nearby allies for a fair amount of health. In Hunter form you'll deal lethal damage and reduce the targets' defense. In Prowler form you'll deal lethal damage, cause minor lethal damage over time and have a good chance to stun. Brutal Swipe builds 1 Primal Energy. Damage: High, Recharge: Moderate
Brutal_Swipe_Prowler.display_target_help: You've been stunned by the Prowler's Brutal Swipe and are suffering damage over time!

Primal_Strike_Prowler.display_help: You strike your foe will the primal forces of nature to deal Superior damage. In primal (human) form you will deal smashing damage and will heal yourself and up to 3 nearby allies for a good amount of health. In Hunter form you'll deal lethal damage and reduce the target's damage slightly. In Prowler form you'll deal lethal damage, cause minor lethal damage over time and have a high chance to stun. This power builds 1 primal energy. Damage: Superior, Recharge: Slow
Primal_Strike_Prowler.display_target_help: You've been stunned by the Prowler's Primal Strike and are suffering damage over time!

Upheaval_Prowler.display_help: You channel the forces of nature and release them shattering the earth beneath you sending shards of stone and debris out at nearby foes causing high damage and potentially knocking them down. In primal (human) form you will deal smashing damage and will heal yourself and up to 3 nearby allies for a large amount of health. In Hunter form you'll deal lethal damage and reduce the targets' resistance slightly. In Prowler form you'll deal lethal damage, cause minor lethal damage over time and have a high chance to stun. Upheaval will deal high damage if the user has no Primal Energy, however it will deal additional damage for each charge of Primal Energies the user owns. Upheaval consumes all Primal Energies. Damage: Special, Recharge: Long
Upheaval_Prowler.display_short_help: PBAoE, Special DMG, Foe Knockdown, -All Primal Energy
Upheaval_Prowler.display_target_help: You've been stunned by the Prowler's Upheaval and are suffering damage over time!

Savage_Blow_Prowler.display_help: Before delivering an absolutely punishing blow you concentrate and channel the forces of nature into your strike to cause Extreme damage. In primal (human) form you will deal smashing damage and will heal yourself and up to 3 nearby allies for a moderate amount of health. In Hunter form you'll deal lethal damage and significantly reduce the target's damage. In Prowler form you'll deal lethal damage, cause moderate lethal damage over time and stun the target. This power builds 2 primal energy. Damage: Extreme, Recharge: Slow
Savage_Blow_Prowler.display_target_help: You've been stunned by the Prowler's Savage Blow and are suffering damage over time!
